form.label: Configure Required Attributes
form.description: Define attribute required for conformance check for individual issuers.

search.query:
| inputlookup attr_required_lookup
| eval key = _key | where key = "$upd_key_tok$"
| eval Issuer_6 = "$upd_Issuer_6_tok$" | eval DocumentType = "$upd_doc_type_tok$"
| eval req_ApplicableLaw = $upd_ApplicableLaw_tok$ | eval req_AutomaticExercise = $upd_AutomaticExercise_tok$ | eval req_CBFAccountNumber = $upd_CBFAccountNumber_tok$ | eval req_CommentField = $upd_CommentField_tok$ | eval req_Coupon = $upd_Coupon_tok$ | eval req_CouponDenomination = $upd_CouponDenomination_tok$ | eval req_Currency = $upd_Currency_tok$ | eval req_Denomination = $upd_Denomination_tok$ | eval req_DistributionCurrency = $upd_DistributionCurrency_tok$ | eval req_EmptyField = $upd_EmptyField_tok$ | eval req_EndOfExercisePeriod = $upd_EndOfExercisePeriod_tok$ | eval req_ExceptionInterestCalculation = $upd_ExceptionInterestCalculation_tok$ | eval req_ExerciseAgent = $upd_ExerciseAgent_tok$ | eval req_Expiry = $upd_Expiry_tok$ | eval req_FirstCoupon = $upd_FirstCoupon_tok$ | eval req_FloaterFrom = $upd_FloaterFrom_tok$ | eval req_GlobalNoteNumber = $upd_GlobalNoteNumber_tok$ | eval req_GlobalNotesLanguage = $upd_GlobalNotesLanguage_tok$ | eval req_ISIN = $upd_ISIN_tok$ | eval req_Increment = $upd_Increment_tok$ | eval req_InstrumentType = $upd_InstrumentType_tok$ | eval req_InterestCycle = $upd_InterestCycle_tok$ | eval req_InterestPaymentType = $upd_InterestPaymentType_tok$ | eval req_InterestPeriodFrom = $upd_InterestPeriodFrom_tok$ | eval req_InterestPeriodTo = $upd_InterestPeriodTo_tok$ | eval req_InterestRate = $upd_InterestRate_tok$ | eval req_Issuer = $upd_Issuer_tok$ | eval req_IssuingAmount = $upd_IssuingAmount_tok$ | eval req_LastCoupon = $upd_LastCoupon_tok$ | eval req_LaunchDate = $upd_LaunchDate_tok$ | eval req_Listing = $upd_Listing_tok$ | eval req_MaturityDate = $upd_MaturityDate_tok$ | eval req_MinExercise = $upd_MinExercise_tok$ | eval req_MinTransferableAmount = $upd_MinTransferableAmount_tok$ | eval req_MinimumAmount = $upd_MinimumAmount_tok$ | eval req_NumberOfShares = $upd_NumberOfShares_tok$ | eval req_NumberReleased = $upd_NumberReleased_tok$ | eval req_OfferingType = $upd_OfferingType_tok$ | eval req_OrderNumber = $upd_OrderNumber_tok$ | eval req_OrderType = $upd_OrderType_tok$ | eval req_PayingAgent = $upd_PayingAgent_tok$ | eval req_PaymentOrShares = $upd_PaymentOrShares_tok$ | eval req_ProductName = $upd_ProductName_tok$ | eval req_Qualifier = $upd_Qualifier_tok$ | eval req_Quote = $upd_Quote_tok$ | eval req_RedemptionModality = $upd_RedemptionModality_tok$ | eval req_RedemptionTo = $upd_RedemptionTo_tok$ | eval req_RedemptionType = $upd_RedemptionType_tok$ | eval req_ReferenceDay = $upd_ReferenceDay_tok$ | eval req_SecondCoupon = $upd_SecondCoupon_tok$ | eval req_SecuritisationType = $upd_SecuritisationType_tok$ | eval req_SecurityType = $upd_SecurityType_tok$ | eval req_StartOfExercisePeriod = $upd_StartOfExercisePeriod_tok$ | eval req_TefraDBondFrom = $upd_TefraDBondFrom_tok$ | eval req_TefraDBondTo = $upd_TefraDBondTo_tok$ | eval req_Type = $upd_Type_tok$ | eval req_Underlying = $upd_Underlying_tok$ | eval req_ValueDate = $upd_ValueDate_tok$ | eval req_WKN = $upd_WKN_tok$ | eval req_XemacParticipant = $upd_XemacParticipant_tok$ | eval req_XemacSystemClaimNumber = $upd_XemacSystemClaimNumber_tok$
| outputlookup attr_required_lookup append=t

| inputlookup attr_required_lookup | append [stats count
| eval Issuer_6 = "$crt_Issuer_6_tok$" | eval DocumentType = "$crt_doc_type_tok$"
| eval req_ApplicableLaw = $crt_ApplicableLaw_tok$ | eval req_AutomaticExercise = $crt_AutomaticExercise_tok$ | eval req_CBFAccountNumber = $crt_CBFAccountNumber_tok$ | eval req_CommentField = $crt_CommentField_tok$ | eval req_Coupon = $crt_Coupon_tok$ | eval req_CouponDenomination = $crt_CouponDenomination_tok$ | eval req_Currency = $crt_Currency_tok$ | eval req_Denomination = $crt_Denomination_tok$ | eval req_DistributionCurrency = $crt_DistributionCurrency_tok$ | eval req_EmptyField = $crt_EmptyField_tok$ | eval req_EndOfExercisePeriod = $crt_EndOfExercisePeriod_tok$ | eval req_ExceptionInterestCalculation = $crt_ExceptionInterestCalculation_tok$ | eval req_ExerciseAgent = $crt_ExerciseAgent_tok$ | eval req_Expiry = $crt_Expiry_tok$ | eval req_FirstCoupon = $crt_FirstCoupon_tok$ | eval req_FloaterFrom = $crt_FloaterFrom_tok$ | eval req_GlobalNoteNumber = $crt_GlobalNoteNumber_tok$ | eval req_GlobalNotesLanguage = $crt_GlobalNotesLanguage_tok$ | eval req_ISIN = $crt_ISIN_tok$ | eval req_Increment = $crt_Increment_tok$ | eval req_InstrumentType = $crt_InstrumentType_tok$ | eval req_InterestCycle = $crt_InterestCycle_tok$ | eval req_InterestPaymentType = $crt_InterestPaymentType_tok$ | eval req_InterestPeriodFrom = $crt_InterestPeriodFrom_tok$ | eval req_InterestPeriodTo = $crt_InterestPeriodTo_tok$ | eval req_InterestRate = $crt_InterestRate_tok$ | eval req_Issuer = $crt_Issuer_tok$ | eval req_IssuingAmount = $crt_IssuingAmount_tok$ | eval req_LastCoupon = $crt_LastCoupon_tok$ | eval req_LaunchDate = $crt_LaunchDate_tok$ | eval req_Listing = $crt_Listing_tok$ | eval req_MaturityDate = $crt_MaturityDate_tok$ | eval req_MinExercise = $crt_MinExercise_tok$ | eval req_MinTransferableAmount = $crt_MinTransferableAmount_tok$ | eval req_MinimumAmount = $crt_MinimumAmount_tok$ | eval req_NumberOfShares = $crt_NumberOfShares_tok$ | eval req_NumberReleased = $crt_NumberReleased_tok$ | eval req_OfferingType = $crt_OfferingType_tok$ | eval req_OrderNumber = $crt_OrderNumber_tok$ | eval req_OrderType = $crt_OrderType_tok$ | eval req_PayingAgent = $crt_PayingAgent_tok$ | eval req_PaymentOrShares = $crt_PaymentOrShares_tok$ | eval req_ProductName = $crt_ProductName_tok$ | eval req_Qualifier = $crt_Qualifier_tok$ | eval req_Quote = $crt_Quote_tok$ | eval req_RedemptionModality = $crt_RedemptionModality_tok$ | eval req_RedemptionTo = $crt_RedemptionTo_tok$ | eval req_RedemptionType = $crt_RedemptionType_tok$ | eval req_ReferenceDay = $crt_ReferenceDay_tok$ | eval req_SecondCoupon = $crt_SecondCoupon_tok$ | eval req_SecuritisationType = $crt_SecuritisationType_tok$ | eval req_SecurityType = $crt_SecurityType_tok$ | eval req_StartOfExercisePeriod = $crt_StartOfExercisePeriod_tok$ | eval req_TefraDBondFrom = $crt_TefraDBondFrom_tok$ | eval req_TefraDBondTo = $crt_TefraDBondTo_tok$ | eval req_Type = $crt_Type_tok$ | eval req_Underlying = $crt_Underlying_tok$ | eval req_ValueDate = $crt_ValueDate_tok$ | eval req_WKN = $crt_WKN_tok$ | eval req_XemacParticipant = $crt_XemacParticipant_tok$ | eval req_XemacSystemClaimNumber = $crt_XemacSystemClaimNumber_tok$ ] | table Issuer_6 DocumentType req_*
| outputlookup attr_required_lookup
| inputlookup attr_required_lookup | eval key=_key | WHERE NOT key="$delete_key_tok$" | outputlookup attr_required_lookup
| inputlookup attr_required_lookup | stats count by DocumentType | sort + DocumentType

| inputlookup attr_required_lookup | search DocumentType = $dd_doc_type$ | eval issuer_code = Issuer_6 | lookup issuer_lookup.csv issuer_code OUTPUT Issuer | eval Issuer = coalesce(Issuer, "Not set - please update Issuer configuration") | eval Update = "Update", Delete = "Delete" | rename req_* AS _req_* | fields - issuer_code | sort + Issuer | table Issuer Issuer_6 DocumentType Update Delete *

html.p: Note: When creating or updating an issuer, all attributes must be set - either 'yes' or 'no'. Creating or Updating is not possible until this requiremed is met! All selection boxes must not be empty.
